snippet: Apps recommended for watchOS 2 include the forecaster Carrot Weather, Citymapper for various modes of travel and the recording program Just Press Record.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights apps for upgraded Apple Watch.
lead_paragraph: Apps recommended for watchOS 2 include the forecaster Carrot Weather, Citymapper for various modes of travel and the recording program Just Press Record.

headline.print_headline: A Grab Bag of Software for the Apple Watch Upgrade
headline.main: A Grab Bag of Software for the Apple Watch Upgrade
